LanguageData.BloodTorch.stages.blood_torch.label: blood torch
LanguageData.BloodTorch.stages.blood_torch.descriptio: No flame burns as softly as a blood torch.
LanguageData.ChildlikePositivity.stages.childlike_won: The world is a magical place and I can't wait to grow up!
LanguageData.ChildlikePositivity.stages.childlike_ent: The world is full of wonders.
LanguageData.ChildlikePositivity.stages.childlike_con: There are so many interesting things to learn.
LanguageData.DeathrestChamber.stages.deathrested_outs: I had to deathrest outdoors. It was awful.
LanguageData.DeathrestChamber.stages.awful_deathrest_: I had to deathrest in an awful chamber.
LanguageData.DeathrestChamber.stages.decent_deathrest: I deathrested in a decent chamber.
LanguageData.DeathrestChamber.stages.good_deathrest_c: I deathrested in a slightly impressive chamber. It was nice.
LanguageData.DeathrestChamber.stages.great_deathrest_: I deathrested in an impressive chamber. I feel rejuvenated.
LanguageData.DeathrestChamber.stages.excellent_deathr: I deathrested in a very impressive chamber. I feel amazing.
LanguageData.DeathrestChamber.stages.exceptional_deat: I deathrested in an extremely impressive chamber. It was glorious.
LanguageData.DeathrestChamber.stages.unbelievable_dea: I deathrested in an unbelievably impressive chamber. It was spectacular.
LanguageData.DeathrestChamber.stages.wondrous_deathre: I deathrested in such a luxurious chamber! It was wondrous.
LanguageData.DeathrestExhaustion.stages.deathrest_exh: The casket calls and I fall weary. The world's pall makes all so dreary. I need to deathrest.
LanguageData.GeneticChemicalDependency.stages.genetic: I need {CHEMICAL_label} because of my genetic deficiency. But it's been so long since I've had any.
LanguageData.HateAura.stages.apocriton_hatred_intense: I feel its hatred inside me, the way I feel my own emotions. It's so close and so cold. They all deserve death.
I hear its hatred echoing between my thoughts. Reasons, always reasons why my friends ought to die.
LanguageData.HateAura.stages.apocriton_hatred_distant: I feel it out there somewhere. It's always thinking about why these people deserve death. Always following the logic of murder. Hard to ignore.
My bones ache. I really need hemogen.
This hurts bad and my head is fuzzy. I would kill for some blood. Maybe I should.
Can't think. Thirst. Thirst. Must. Have. Blood.
LanguageData.KillThirst.stages.kill_thirst.label: kill thirst
LanguageData.KillThirst.stages.kill_thirst.descriptio: Must kill... it has been too long since I have killed somebody up close and personal.
LanguageData.NoxiousHaze.stages.acidic_smog.label: acidic smog
LanguageData.NoxiousHaze.stages.acidic_smog.descripti: The smog makes my eyes water and it smells awful. I wish I could just have a few fresh breaths.
LanguageData.PregnancyAttitude.stages.new_pregnancy-0: I'm pregnant! It makes me happy.
LanguageData.PregnancyAttitude.stages.new_pregnancy-1: I'm pregnant and not very happy about it.
LanguageData.PregnancyMood_Collapse.stages.pregnancy_: This pregnancy is so hard. My body always feels awful. So exhausting!
LanguageData.PregnancyMood_Down.stages.pregnancy_mood: It feels like everything is going wrong for me today. Pregnancy is tough.
LanguageData.PregnancyMood_High.stages.pregnancy_mood: I feel amazing! Being pregnant is a gift!
LanguageData.PregnancyMood_Up.stages.pregnancy_mood_u: Everything feels a little bit more pleasant today. Pregnancy is nice.
LanguageData.PsychicBondProximity.stages.psychic_bond: The bond brings us together, sharing feelings and thoughts. It's like a friend who is always with me.
The distance makes it so hard to hear. I feel alone, like standing in a dark, silent cavern.
LanguageData.Recluse.stages.recluse_alone.label: recluse alone
LanguageData.Recluse.stages.recluse_alone.description: It's a relief not to have to think about other people.
LanguageData.Recluse.stages.recluse_in_small_group.de: I'm happy I don't have too many people to think about. Alone would be better, but this is good too.
LanguageData.Recluse.stages.recluse_crowded.label: recluse crowded
LanguageData.Recluse.stages.recluse_crowded.descripti: There's too many people around here. The weight of having to think about them bears down on me.
LanguageData.Recluse.stages.recluse_very_crowded.desc: There are so many people I'm supposed to be working with. They're overwhelming.
LanguageData.ScanningSickness.stages.scanning_sicknes: Ever since that scan I've been dizzy and I can't think.
LanguageData.SunlightSensitivity_Major.stages.sunligh: The sunlight burns my eyes and my skin feels like it's being scorched.
LanguageData.SunlightSensitivity_Mild.stages.sunlight: The sun hurts my eyes and my skin is tingling unpleasantly.
